org.apache.james.util.retry.naming

Class NamingExceptionRetryHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.util.retry.ExceptionRetryHandler
      • org.apache.james.util.retry.naming.NamingExceptionRetryHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RetryHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoggingRetryHandler

    public abstract class NamingExceptionRetryHandler
extends ExceptionRetryHandler
    Abstract class NamingExceptionRetryHandler narrows the set of Exceptions throwable by perform to NamingException and its subclasses.

    RuntimeExceptions are not retried.

    See Also:
    org.apache.james.user.ldap.ExceptionRetryHandler
